textBeforeTable: Golden Sands Weather Golden Sands is situated on a hillside, the hotels (except those on or very near to the beach) are reached by sloping paths or steps. Elderly clients, or people with walking or breathing difficulties, should bear this in mind when selecting accommodation in Golden Sands. Click here for Golden Sands Flight Only. Click here for Golden Sands Customer Reviews Important note Golden Sands has a varied range of eating spots including the Amphora restaurant located on the sands, and great nightspots such as the ever-popular Muppet Karoake Bar and Bonkers nightclub.
